headline: MSI Launches V200 Body Camera for Frontline Workers: Stock to Gain?
summary: Motorola introduces a V200 body camera to support frontline workers in retail, hospitality, schools, stadiums and other sectors.

raw.headline: MSI Launches V200 Body Camera for Frontline Workers: Stock to Gain?
raw.summary: Motorola introduces a V200 body camera to support frontline workers in retail, hospitality, schools, stadiums and other sectors.

headline: Motorola Solutions to Acquire Theatro, Maker of AI and Voice-powered Communication and Digital Workflow Software for Frontline Workers
summary: CHICAGO, January 10, 2025--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Theatro Labs, Inc. ("Theatro"), maker of AI and voice-powered communication and digital workflow software for frontline workers, based in Richardson, Texas.
